resources.string: Select the names of released Android versions!
What is the capital city of this country?

Droid buys two equal packs of candies with the money he has been collected for years in his piggy bank. Unfortunately, after he goes out from the store, he get robbed by five candy muggers. Each of the muggers steals six candies. Of course, Droid is sad because he has only two candies left. But, the saddest thing is he don\'t know how many candies are there in one full pack. Help him find the answer! Write in decimal.
Having depth more than 10 km, it is the deepest known point below ocean surface. What is its name? Write in lowercase.

Jack Sparrow has just discovered a treasure map in the coast of Bermuda. But, his celebration didn\'t last long. He realized that his ship and all the crew are suddenly disappeared (it\'s normal here) right after he took a shot of tequila while sitting on white soft Caribbean beach sand. Surprisingly, he was not surprised. Apparently, his mind was still scrambled by the problem he found on that map. There are 13 golden chests located in that island. Each chest can only be discovered at most once. Otherwise, it might disappear into nothing but disappointment (remember, it\'s Bermuda). So, the plan is he want to take shortest route that visit each chest once and go back to this beautiful beach as soon as possible before sunset. What\'s the name of this problem?
These countries have blue color in their flags
